titles.title: 402 All The Way My Savior Leads Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
Verse 1
All the way my Savior leads me
What have I to ask beside
Can I doubt His tender mercy
Who thro' life has been my Guide
Heav'nly peace
Divinest comfort
Here by faith in Him to dwell

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
For I know whate'er befall me
Jesus doeth all things well
For I know whate'er befall me
Jesus doeth all things well

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
All the way my Savior leads me
Cheers each winding
Path I tread
Gives me grace for every trial
Feeds me with the living bread
Tho' my weary steps may falter
And my soul athirst may be

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Gushing from
The Rock before me
Lo a spring of joy I see
Gushing from
The Rock before me
Lo a spring of joy I see

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
All the way my Savior leads me
O the fullness of His love
Perfect rest to me is promised
In my Father's house above
When my spirit
Clothed immortal
Wings its flight
To realms of day

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
This my song
Thro' endless ages
Jesus led me all the way
This my song
Thro' endless ages
Jesus led me all the way
